value.title: Fuzzy Clustering in Power BI using Power Query   Finding similar values
value.excerpt: I have explained in two other videos about fuzzy operations in Power BI and Power Query so far;  fuzzy matching in Power BI, and fuzzy grouping. the methods above involve transforming the data with a fuzzy operation. value.title: Get the List of FOLDERS only in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: There are times that you need to get the list of FOLDERS and not just files. Of course folder itself (without considering files in it), doesn't contain data to be used for a report. However, sometimes, even the folder name might contain some useful information. The Get Data From Folder option in Power
